name: Haven Glebe
address: 196 Glebe Point Road, Glebe, 2037 Sydney, Australia
fullDesc: The 4-star Haven Glebe is located in the cosmopolitan inner city suburb of Glebe, just 14 minutes from the ICC Sydney via the light rail. It offers stylish, modern rooms with a 40-inch LCD TV. Guests can relax in Australia.

name: Sri Lanka
address: No. 150/12, Samanthara Road, Molligoda, 12560 Wadduwa, Sri Lanka
fullDesc: The perfect honeymoon of your dreams does exist when you book this customisable 3 nights 4 days Sri Lanka honeymoon package which includes some of the most sought after destinations in Sri Lanka. This 4-day honeymoon package from Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore and other major Indian cities takes you to Negombo, Kandy and Bentota- each known for most amazing tourist attractions in Sri Lanka.

name: Victoria Hotel (SG Clean)
fullDesc: Attractively located in the Victoria district of Singapore, Victoria Hotel (SG Clean) is situated 200 m from Singapore Art Museum, 400 m from Raffles City and 500 m from Bugis Street.

name: Ghaya Grand Hotel
address: International Media Production Zone, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
fullDesc: Ghaya Grand Hotel is located in Dubai Production City, near the Tecom Zone. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the property. It offers a swimming pool and 5 restaurants.

name: Villa Sally
address: Exclusive Bali Honeymoon Packages For A Romantic Getaway
fullDesc: Villa Sally is a luxury complex located in Canggu, 1.3 km from Berawa Beach. The villa has air conditioning and free WiFi. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Disney Hotel Cheyenne
address: Rue du BÅ“uf Agile, 77700 Coupvray, France
fullDesc: Best hotel for stay. It guarantees a blissful and memorable honeymoon with lots of activities and super romantic moments. If you are looking for a 5n/6d Andaman package, look no further. Starting from Port Blair, this Andaman honeymoon package proceeds to Havelock and Neil.
